thread.title: After two comeback wins we talk about the 13th straight conf
thread.title_full: After two comeback wins we talk about the 13th straight conf

author: rivals.com
title: After two comeback wins we talk about the 13th straight conf
text:
After two comeback wins we talk about the 13th straight conference title is now on the brink. Is this Self's toughest team and what is the latest with recruiting?
Special guest offensive coordinator Doug Meacham joins the Jayhawk Slant staff to talk about his plans with the offense and spring football. We go in-depth will several football topics and answer some of your questions.
Come inside for the latest edition of the Jayhawk Slant podcast.
